titleStmt.title: A proclamation for discovering who robbed the packquit
Proclamations. 1692-08-15
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the fifteenth day of August, and of our reign the fourth year, 1692.
Steele notation: Arms 245 Defen- Contempt be.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2359 cropped; lacking imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
